ChatRequest
This is for "chat" mode.
Config

Message

Message.Roles

OllamaJava.JSONIO
Trace buffer element.
OllamaJava.StreamListener
 
Options
Encapsulates various options for adjusting the behavior of the model.
Request
Represents a request to an Ollama model, allowing customization of model parameters and inclusion of system and user prompts.
Response
This is the full response, returned in synchronous mode or at the end of a streamed interaction.
StreamedResponse
Responses can be partial (one word) or full.
